resources.string: FunkStille is designed for android users that frequently cross borders and have to rely on Wi-Fi because of roaming, but can use 3g connectivity in the other country. FunkStille can automatically enable or disable Wi-Fi for you, allowing you to save power. FunkStille also provides some basic configuration settings that the frequent roamer will appreciate.
Enable bluetooth when power is connected
Enables the device\'s bluetooth adapter when a power cable is plugged in. The power cable can both be a regular power adapter or a USB cable
Disable bluetooth when power is disconnected
Disables the device\'s bluetooth adapter when a power cable is unplugged. The power cable can both be a regular power adapter or a USB cable
Enables the device\'s WiFi adapter once the cellular connection starts roaming (is connected to a foreign network)
Disables the device\'s WiFi adapter once the cellular connection stops roaming (is connected to a home network)
